document.full_text: the u.s. government on thursday pressured food companies to cut back on aggressive advertising of junk food to kids, saying it contributes to a serious health crisis facing young americans.
document.title: us proposes advertisers ditch junk food for kids
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government on thursday pressured food companies to cut back on aggressive advertising of junk food to kids, saying it contributes to a serious health crisis facing young americans.
